title: Padma Emerald & Rose Quartz Antique Finish Haaram
materials: 22K Gold with Antique Hyderabadi Polish. Features natural
and brilliant-cut Uncut Diamonds (Polki). Exceptional gemstone clarity and color saturation.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a harmonious blend of traditional and contemporary design elements. The necklace features a delicate arrangement of emeralds and diamonds, leading to a central Rose Quartz pendant encased in a diamond floral motif. The centerpiece is a large, intricately carved Green Quartz pendant, surrounded by an elaborate diamond setting in a floral design, exuding elegance and grandeur. Handcrafted with meticulous detail, showcasing the best of Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
colors: The palette is dominated by the blush pink of the Rose Quartz
the vibrant green of the Emeralds and Green Quartz
and the warm golden hue of the antique-polished gold. The diamonds provide a brilliant white contrast.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaahaalu)
and upscale social events. A treasured heirloom piece for a Seemantham (baby shower) or half-saree function.
description: This Haaram is a masterpiece of South Indian jewelry design, blending time-honored techniques with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality natural gemstones, combined with the meticulous craftsmanship of the Hyderabadi polish, makes this piece a valuable investment. Its unique design and vibrant color palette ensure it will be a cherished statement piece for generations. An ideal choice for the discerning woman who appreciates heritage and artistry.
